edu.umn.se.trap.form
Class CurrencyConverter

java.lang.Object
  edu.umn.se.trap.form.CurrencyConverter

public class CurrencyConverter
extends java.lang.Object

This class manages conversions to expenses to USD.

Author:
andrewh

Method Detail

convertToUSD

public static java.lang.Double convertToUSD(java.lang.Double amount,
                                            java.lang.String currency,
                                            java.util.Date date)
Convert the given amount of money to USD from the specified currency on the date provided.

Parameters:
amount - - The amount to convert
currency - - The currency for the amount
date - - The date to use when looking up the conversion rate
Returns:
- The amount converted to USD according to the conversion rate for currency on the given date.

convertToUSD

public static java.lang.Double convertToUSD(java.lang.Double amount,
                                            java.lang.String currency,
                                            java.lang.String date)
Convert the given amount of money to USD from the specified currency on the date provided.

Parameters:
amount - - The amount to convert
currency - - The currency for the amount
date - - The date to use when looking up the conversion rate
Returns:
- The amount converted to USD according to the conversion rate for currency on the given date.

convertExpenseCurrency

public static void convertExpenseCurrency(ExpenseWithCurrencyIface expense)
                                   throws InputValidationException
Given an expense which implements the ExpenseWithCurrencyIface, this function will convert the internal currency to USD and reset the fields in the expense appropriately.

Parameters:
expense - - expense to convert currency
Throws:
InputValidationException - - When the currency is missing for the expense.
